name: dry food for cats
title: Vital Balance Sensitive · dry food for cats · Turkey and rice
description: Vital Balance dry food for cats Turkey and rice Duactis - Sensitive

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Turkey (18%) (including bone, meat, skin), rice (15%), dried turkey protein, corn, corn protein meal, pea protein, animal fats, soya meal, dried chicory root* (2%), minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts, fish oil. *natural fibers.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 48000; Vit D3: 1300; Vit E: 460; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 700; Iron(II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 105); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.6); Copper(II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 11); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 39); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 98); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.11). antioxidants.

usageInformation.additionalInformation:
PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a special nutritional formula with beneficial functional bacteria that scientifically proven to strengthen your cat's defences.


PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a dual defense formula developed by Purina's nutritionists and veterinarians that contains

- Beneficial functional bacteria that help support your cat's natural antibody production from the inside

- Key nutrients, including Omega 6 fatty acids, which promote healthy skin and coat from the outside

 
The high-quality Purina VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® recipes are available in a wide range of tasty varieties.

No added colorings, no added artificial flavors and no added preservatives

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide : Discover also Vital Balance high quality nutrition in wet products with a range of delicious recipes specifically to meet your cat’s tailored needs. The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Clean, fresh drinking water should be available at all times. If you feed Vital Balance for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by mixing an increasing amount of Vital Balance with your cat’s current food for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
